title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competencies: Transformational Instructional Design Capability Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in educational theory and social studies content
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can propose at least three educational design strategies utilizing the four skills of transformative learning (self-understanding, self-regulation, self-care, and self-reconstruction).
Learners can create at least one microlearning content piece reflecting an individual learner’s social identity using digital tools.
Learners can derive at least five evaluation criteria for the educational effectiveness of transformative instructional design based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
